author: chianca
title: Portuguese onboarding Video Series
description: Across Brazil, English is not routinely spoken and portuguese is the language.  Language barriers reduce participation in Catalyst.
solution: Our goal is to create an educational mini-video series in the portuguese language, with a simple and objective approach thru animation.
experience:
Contributor to The Catalyst School, Cardano Translator and SPO.
Business administration and Law degrees.
